name: Cafe Crush (itch)
description:
Congrats! You are the proud owner of your very own boba tea shop.  

Complete drink orders for customers and make their day. ☀️

TIPS:

Click the "Open" sign to get started.

There are 4 drink types each with 4 ingredients. See the Recipes file in the downloads section if you get stuck.  Each drink request shows up in the top right corner as a reference.

  • Matcha 
  • Strawberry 
  • Taro 
  • Traditional Milk Tea 

Recipes and game are not complete, but will be updated after the review period is over for the game jam. Enjoy! :3

CREDITS

Coding: TylerCode (Twitter)

Artwork: Amanda Hill (Twitter)

Music & Audio: SideArm Studios

We hope you enjoy this short game made for #LOWREZJAM 2021
